summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 21st Avenue South, from Rainier Avenue to Hanford Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 345 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
